abstract: Park Chu-Young (Hangul: 박주영; hanja: 朴主永; romanised as Park Ju-Young; born 10 July 1985) is a South Korean footballer who plays for Watford in the Football League Championship on loan from Arsenal.
comment: Park Chu-Young (Hangul: 박주영; hanja: 朴主永; romanised as Park Ju-Young; born 10 July 1985) is a South Korean footballer who plays for Watford in the Football League Championship on loan from Arsenal.
